text: -hira#NyamuqpAsya# juhOtyagniqvatyEqva ju#hOtiq nAndhO$&ddhvaqryurBava#tiq na yaqj~ja(gm) rakShA(gm)#si Gnantiq prAcIq prEta#maddhvaqraM kaqlpa#yantIq ityA#ha suvaqrgamEqvainE# lOqkaM ga#mayaqtyatra# ramEthAqM ~MvarShma#n pRuthiqvyA ityA#haq varShmaq hyE#tat pRu#thiqvyA yad dE#vaqyaja#naq(gm)q SirOq vA Eqtad-yaqj~jasyaq yaddha#viqd^^rdhAna#M diqvO vA# viShNavuqta vA# pRuthiqvyA- [  ] 47
